jd:
Job Title – Technical PM/Project coordinator
Location: Los Angeles, USA(Hybrid)
Must Have Skills –
Skill 1 – Yrs of Exp – 10+ - Project manager/coordinator
Skill 2 – Yrs of Exp – Cloud migration
Skill 3 – Yrs of Exp – AWS

JD: Technical Project Manager (Cloud Migration - AWS)
Responsibilities:
- Manage cloud migration and enablement projects, specifically in AWS environments.
- Coordinate with technical teams to ensure smooth and efficient project execution.
- Develop and maintain project timelines, budgets, and documentation.
- Identify risks and issues, proposing solutions to mitigate them.

Qualifications:
- Experience in managing cloud migration projects, preferably in AWS.
- Experience in Managing AWS Application Development and Support Projects
- Understanding of cloud architecture and services.
- Proactive and responsible individual with excellent problem-solving abilities.
